name: Panic at the Billabong
description:
Welcome to the peaceful and quiet Billabong!

After returning to the Billabong with your friend Big T, he disappears! It is now up to you, the player, to ask around town for clues of where he might've gone to.

Help the locals and explore the area with the goal of ultimately solving the mystery of the disappearance of Big T and restore peace to the Billabong!
